actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain areas in the United States as wilderness.

summary.text: Designates the following areas in the United States as wilderness areas: (1) Glacier Primitive Area, Wyoming; (2) Aqua Tibia Primitive Area, California; (3) Gore Range-Eagles Nest Primitive Area, Colorado; (4) Emigrant Basin Primitive Area, California; (5) San Juan and Upper Rio Grande Primitive Areas, Colorado; (6) Mission Mountains Primitive Area, Montana; (7) Aldo Leopold Primitive Area, New Mexico; and (8) Blue Range Primitive Area, New Mexico and Arizona.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain areas in the United States as wilderness.
